Description: St Antony; whole-length figure in frontal view, standing on top of a demon; another impression of the second state. c. 1480 Engraving
Producer name: Print made by: Israhel van Meckenem
Curator's comments: Variant in reverse of L 309A. For another impression of the second state, see 1869,0213.251.
Bibliographic references: Lehrs 1908-34 / Geschichte und kritische Katalog des deutschen, niederländischen und französischen Kupferstichs im XV Jahrhundert (IX.260.310.II)
Hollstein / German engravings, etchings and woodcuts c.1400-1700 (310.II)
Associated names: Representation of: St Antony of Egypt
Acquisition name: Bequeathed by: Sir Hans Sloane (with Philipe's oval stamp and the initials HS)
